channel.title: Comments on: ENDLESS INDONESIA
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Carson
item.description: Proof-read?! I believed all of that mess up until that last lie, Will-in-a-China-Shop. Never Again!
item.content:encoded: Proof-read?! I believed all of that mess up until that last lie, Will-in-a-China-Shop. Never Again!

item.title: by: Stussey
item.description: Your blogs are not a mess my dear friend, some of us are envious of your treks and journeys. Especially since your blogs are the closest thing to traveling that I am able to do. Stay safe....
item.content:encoded:
Your blogs are not a mess my dear friend, some of us are envious of your treks and journeys. Especially since your blogs are the closest thing to traveling that I am able to do.
Stay safe….

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description:
I'm glad you're still alive Will, even if you are just barely scraping by the scrawny fingers of death. =)
No one has ever named a puppy after me. That sounds like the highest honor.
I love you and miss you!
item.content:encoded:
I’m glad you’re still alive Will, even if you are just barely scraping by the scrawny fingers of death. =)

No one has ever named a puppy after me. That sounds like the highest honor.

I love you and miss you!
